trans-unit.source: List tools installed in the current development environment.
trans-unit.target: 列出目前開發環境中所安裝的工具。

trans-unit.source: List tools in the current user's tools directory.
trans-unit.target: 列出目前使用者工具目錄中的工具。
警告: 工具套件 '{0}' 無效: {1}

trans-unit.source: (--global) conflicts with the tool path option (--tool-path). Please specify only one of the options.
trans-unit.target: (--global) 與工具路徑選項 (--tool-path) 衝突。請只指定其中一個選項。

trans-unit.source: The directory containing the tools to list.
trans-unit.target: 包含要列出之工具的目錄。

trans-unit.source: Please specify either the global option (--global), local option (--local), or the tool path option (--tool-path).
trans-unit.target: Please specify either the global option (--global), local option (--local), or the tool path option (--tool-path).

trans-unit.source: (--local) conflicts with the tool path option (--tool-path). Please specify only one of the options.
trans-unit.target: (--local) conflicts with the tool path option (--tool-path). Please specify only one of the options.

trans-unit.source: (--local) conflicts with the global option (--global). Please specify only one of the options.
trans-unit.target: (--local) conflicts with the global option (--global). Please specify only one of the options.

trans-unit.source: List tools in the current user's current directory.
trans-unit.target: List tools in the current user's current directory.
